instant.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: a system that provides instant access to client information
The women took an instant dislike to one another.
The programme brought an instant response.
instant.translation[0].definitions[1].de: instant food, coffee etc is in the form of powder and prepared by adding hot water
instant.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: She caught his eye for an instant.
When the rain started, the crowd vanished in an instant  (=immediately).
She stepped towards the door and, in that very same instant, the doorbell rang.
instant.translation[2].definitions[0].ex: We do not expect instant profits.
The agreement will offer subscribers instant access to overseas databases.
